name: 圖像防偽科技研究
description: This course deals with the implementation of various anti-counterfeiting technologies. In recent years, researches on watermarking/data hiding have been very active in multimedia application.
goals: To enhance the theoretical understanding, computer implementation and hand-on practice of the start-of-the-art anti-counterfeiting technologies, especially for security printing and digital hologram.

methodologies.note: Q & A between teacher and students.

grading.note: homework sets, quiz and hand-on exam
will be held in around 13 weeks.
all class materials will be covered.
students have to attend the class.
a hand-on project; 2-3 students as a group.
